name: Slime Shooter (SayuGameDev)
description:
Game made for Mix and Gamejam!
Here I recreated the vacuum mechanics from the game Slime Ranger.

Vacuum slimes and use them to pop the balloons!

Control:
"A" and "D" - Move to the sides
"1", "2" and "3" or mouse wheel - Change slot
Mouse left click - Shoot
Mouse right click - Vacuum
Aim the vacuum with mouse cursor.

If you played this game, please, leave a feedback. They are important to me, and I'm sure I'll learn a lot from them!

Thank you o/
